items.summary: Restore the cases list display so that existing cases are visible in the Cases view. In Version 78, the list shows 'No cases found' even though cases existed and displayed correctly in Version 77. Audit changes made in Version 78 to CasesListView, filtering, search, and query hooks, and revert or fix any logic that incorrectly filters out or fails to load cases.

Fix the broken app logo in the top-left corner of the navigation header. The image is rendering as a broken image placeholder (paper icon with a line through it). Locate the logo asset reference in App.tsx and ensure the correct image path or inline SVG/component is used so the logo displays properly.
